amendment.description: Amendment increases funding for Maternal and Child Health accounts by $7,000,000.
amendment.purpose: An amendment numbered 41 printed in Part B of House Report 116-109 to increase funding for Maternal and Child Health accounts by $7,000,000.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Richmond amendment (A039) Agreed to by recorded vote: 365 - 59 (Roll no. 288).

action.text: Amendment agreed to Committee of the Whole
Roll call votes on amendments in House
House amendment agreed to: On agreeing to the Richmond amendment (A039) Agreed to by recorded vote: 365 - 59 (Roll no. 288).
House amendment offered/reported by: Amendment (A039) offered by Mr. Richmond.
